content:
Sandra Vance said:

The 28th HL7 FHIR Connectathon will take place September 13-15, 2021 and will be an all virtual event. Track proposals are due on Wednesday, July 21. (next week!) and final schedules for Whova will be due on July 30th.

If you would like to bring a track to the September Connectathon, please review the Connectathon Track Lead Responsibilities Page here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/Connectathon+Track+Lead+Responsibilities
and the Track Lead Check List of key dates on the right side of the Connectathon 28 Confluence Page here:
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021+-+09+Connectathon+28.

Scroll to the bottom of that confluence page and click the “Create New Track” button to enter your track information.

*Tracks submitted not using this form or left incomplete will be removed from the Connectathon 28 Confluence Page on July 23rd. Please let me know if you have any questions!

Any plans for the connectathon?
I think it would be a good idea. It would be a good opportunity to test lab results SMART Health Cards for anyone interested, along with Immunization cards that we focused on last Connectathon.

Cerner's API supports issuance of Immunization and Lab health cards. The open sandbox should have test patients ready to go: http://fhir.cerner.com/millennium/r4/other/health-cards/#laboratory-test-result-credentials-dm

Available for the Connectathon, but you don't have to wait!

Didn't realize the deadline was up already for that. I can submit a quick track proposal along the lines of what Reece suggested. Would probably be similar to last track proposal, just with more of a focus on labs.
Thanks @Neelima Karipineni (and it's OK if the details / updated scenarios come later)
I created https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021-09+SMART+Health+Cards+for+Vaccination+and+Testing based on the May connectathon

Early-bird registration for the connectathon ends today
Early bird: HL7 member $175, non-member $275
After 16 Aug: HL7 member $275, non-member $400

Last day to register for the connectathon is 30 August
https://www.hl7.org/events/fhir/connectathon/2021/09/
